definition: in Hinduism, the name for the original social division of Vedic people into four groups, which are subdivided into thousands of jatis
details:
noun
- in Hinduism, the name for the original social division of Vedic people into four groups, which are subdivided into thousands of jatis
= example: in Hinduism, the name for the original social division of Vedic people into four groups, which are subdivided into thousands of jatis
